CustomField.description: Indicates whether customisation fields are filled or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Customisation_Required__c=TRUE, OR( ISBLANK(Due_Date_of_Customisations__c), Product_Customisation_Required_Filled__c = FALSE, ISBLANK(Product_Sign_Off_Owner__c))), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Okay Red: Customisation fields are required.
CustomField.label: Check - Customisation Required
